trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There was one other sighting in Albuquerque on or around December 31st 2011
Summary: bright green streaking light like a shooting star. Faded to reveal v shaped object.
divs: Sighting Detailslooking west while walking my dog with two friends when we viewed s huge bright green fireball flying north. I alerted my friends of the anomaly It then faded to reveal a slightly shiny v-shaped object that drifted off in another direction and we lost sight of it. The object seemed to descend but when the green light faded it seemed to start flying level without slowing at all.
